import React from "react"; import { Link, useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import Axios from "axios"; // import firebase from "../../../services/firebase"; import { toast } from "react-toastify"; import "react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.min.css"; export default function Login() { const [formData, setFormData] = React.useState({ email: "", password: "", }); const submit = async () => { const { name, email, password } = formData; Axios.post("http://localhost:3001/api/auth/admin/login", { email: email, password: password, }).then(() => { toast.success("Login berhasil"); }); }; const handleInputChange = (event) => { const { target } = event; const { name, value } = target; setFormData((prevState) => ({ ...prevState, [name]: value })); }; return ( <>
